item.title: Retrieve a list of Azure VM which aren't protected with just-in-time network access control
item.description: Introduction I was asked to build a PowerShell script to retrieve Azure virtual machines with no Just In Time (JIT) access enabled. Yes, it’s for the security auditing team. I searched in PowerShell Gallery, TechNet Gallery, and other sources and didn’t find one. So, I developed a script that may help you! Solution First, I thought of retrieving virtual machines and query against the JIT Access Policy REST API endpoint. But it’s not required!
